body_html:
Hi @ngimel Felix@NVidia confirmed that cuDNN is not officially supported on Ubuntu 17.04. I am using it for an internal image and cuDNN is working without a glitch, but it would be risky to switch PyTorch official image to 17.04 without NVidia support.

I am closing this PR for now.
body_text:
Hi @ngimel Felix@NVidia confirmed that cuDNN is not officially supported on Ubuntu 17.04.  I am using it for an internal image and cuDNN is working without a glitch, but it would be risky to switch PyTorch official image to 17.04 without NVidia support.
I am closing this PR for now.
body:
Hi @ngimel Felix@NVidia confirmed that cuDNN is not officially supported on Ubuntu 17.04.  I am using it for an internal image and cuDNN is working without a glitch, but it would be risky to switch PyTorch official image to 17.04 without NVidia support.   

I am closing this PR for now.
